stories.headline: EU Leaders Agree on New Green Deal Funding Mechanism
stories.summary: European Union leaders concluded a summit, agreeing on a new financial framework to accelerate green transition goals. This impacts economic stability and environmental efforts across the continent.

stories.headline: Global Tech Alliance Proposes Unified AI Safety Standards
stories.summary: A consortium of leading tech companies and governments unveiled a framework for global AI safety and ethics. This aims to standardize development and mitigate risks worldwide.

stories.headline: East African Nations Sign Landmark Regional Trade Agreement
stories.summary: Several East African countries formalized a new free trade agreement to boost economic integration and development. This promises significant economic growth and stability for the region.

stories.headline: US Federal Reserve Signals Potential Rate Hike Amid Inflation Concerns
stories.summary: The Federal Reserve indicated a potential interest rate increase in early 2026, citing persistent inflation. This impacts borrowing costs and economic forecasts for businesses and consumers.

stories.headline: WHO Warns of New Respiratory Virus Strain in Southeast Asia
stories.summary: The World Health Organization issued an alert regarding a rapidly spreading new respiratory virus strain. Public health measures are being reinforced to prevent a wider outbreak.
